post:
USA Cheapest Windows & Linux VPS Hosting - payza, Moneybookers, Perfect Money Accept!

Windows™ Server VPS hosting provides specific options not available on our LINUX hosting platforms, We are now providing
cheapest Windows VPS servers with 2003, 2008 and 2012 in Web, Standard and Enterprise Edition. All Windows VPS servers
come with remote desktop (RDP) enabled. These are hosted on enterprise grade multi-core Hardware with a minimum
of 32/16GB RAM with raid-10 protected storage and offer a 99.9% uptime guarantee. Windows VPS servers are available in USA.
You can choose to have MSSQL 2008 and WebsitePanel pre-installed on order form., with prices starting at only $16.95 per month.

We Accept Payza (Alertpay), Moneybookers (Skrill) and Perfect Money as payment methods. Users from all countries are accepted. If you have any questions please feel free to submit a sales ticket with our sales department.


OVERVIEW:

Windows 2003, 2008 and 2012 (in both 32Bit and 64Bit)
MSSQL 2008 with all windows 2003, 2008 and 2012 servers (FREE)
WebSitePanel Panel with all windows 2003, 2008 and windows 2012 servers (FREE)
Remote Desktop (RDP) is Enabled on setup
Free Unlimited Manual Reboots
Free Unlimited OS Re-installs
Free Unlimited Version Changes
Free Web Site Panel Control Panel
Full Administrative Access (No Cache)
1-Click Upgrades
There are no CONTRACTS

____________________________

==================================================================

Linux is the traditional VPS web hosting platform, that is extremely reliable and robust. Our most affordable and reliable
VPS hosting packages are Linux based, with prices starting at only $12.95 per month! Available operating systems include:
CentOS™, Debian™, Ubuntu™, Fedora™, & Gentoo™. Control panel software is optionally available on all Linux VPS hosting
accounts, including; - CPanel™, DirectAdmin™, & Plesk™. Our Linux VPS hosting accounts currently run on the vePortal™ platform.

FEATURES:

--- Instant Reboots within the VPS control Panel.
--- Instant OS reloads within the VPS control panel.
--- Instant Shutdown/power on your VPS server within the control panel.
--- 100Mbps & 1Gbps internet connections.
--- Raid-10 protected hard drives. This means Zero down time in case of hardware failures.
--- Built-in server console within the VPS control panel.
--- TUN/TAP options within the VPS control panel.
--- Change your host name instantly via VPS control panel.

Q: How long does it take to setup a VPS?
A: On average, less than 6 hours since you ordered your VPS; however we won't take more than 24 hours.

Q: Where are your servers located?
A: USA DATACENTERS.

Q: What type of server are these VPS hosted on?
A: Quad Core Xeon With Minimum 12 - 32GB RAM


Q: Can you help transfer our data?
A: Actually we can do this as long as you have the data in a cPanel or DirectAdmin VPS.
